title: Supplements and Products
cleaned_text: The People's Acupuncture of AshevilleAn Affordable Community Clinic SUPPLEMENTS + PRODUCTS We have a well stocked assortment of pre-made Chinese herbs, liniments, and supplements for sale! During your treatment we may recommend a formula or supplement that may benefit you. We do not do separate herbal consultations but offer recommendations as part of your Acupuncture treatment. If you already have an herbal formula that you take, call or stop by and we can sell you another bottle of what you need. We do sell to the public as well. We have t-shirts! We have hats! We have stickers!
